name: EXTREMELY DARKNESS THE POSE OF THE SILENT DOLL
name_original: EXTREMELY DARKNESS THE POSE OF THE SILENT DOLL
description:
EXTREMELY DARKNESS THE POSE OF THE SILENT DOLL

   A journalist that has a doll bear since her childhood named Oub, gets scared by big castles but her job leads her one day to Dr.Marco Right Castel to get to interview him about his work and philosophies... unluckily the doctor has different plans for her...

play this dark story the first EXTREMELY development ©️ game

available in-game :

Text in English and french + Controller supported
